org.micromanager

Class StagePosition

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.micromanager.StagePosition

  • public class StagePosition
extends java.lang.Object
    Description of the position of a 1 or 2 axis stage.

    • Field Summary

    • Field Detail

      • x

        @Deprecated
public double x
        Deprecated. Use methods instead.
        For two-axis stages, the X position; for one-axis stages, the only stage position. For example, if using a Z focus drive, its position would be given by the "x" parameter.

      • y

        @Deprecated
public double y
        Deprecated. Use methods instead.
        The Y position for two-axis stages.

      • z

        @Deprecated
public double z
        Deprecated. 
        RESERVED: do not use.

      • stageName

        @Deprecated
public java.lang.String stageName
        Deprecated. Use set1DPosition(java.lang.String, double) or set2DPosition(java.lang.String, double, double) to set; use getStageDeviceLabel() to access.
        The stage device label.

      • numAxes

        @Deprecated
public int numAxes
        Deprecated. Use set1DPosition(java.lang.String, double) or set2DPosition(java.lang.String, double, double) to set; use getNumberOfStageAxes(), is1DStagePosition(), or is2DStagePosition() to access.
        The number of stage axes. Must be 1 or 2.

public StagePosition()
        Deprecated. Use create1D(java.lang.String, double) or create2D(java.lang.String, double, double) instead.
        Default constructor.
